name: Healthy Mexican Soup
author: Joel N Alta Morris
summary: A spicy Mexican soup with hidden healthy ingredients. Very easy to adapt and personalize! The pasta, tofu, and wheat germ are optional, but they add a lot of health benefits! It's hard to go wrong with this recipe. If you have a little more or a little less of certain items, dump them all together and see what you think!
ingredients: 1 cup frozen corn, or more to taste
¼ cup wheat germ, or more to taste
1 dash hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®), or to taste
directions: Combine diced tomatoes, water, kidney beans, corn, rotini, tofu, wheat germ, and hot pepper sauce in a pot; bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer until rotini are tender, about 20 minutes
